thread.title: Photoshop maker Adobe's revenue jumps 21 pct on cloud push
thread.title_full: Photoshop maker Adobe's revenue jumps 21 pct on cloud push | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Photoshop maker Adobe's revenue jumps 21 pct on cloud push
text:
Sept 17 Photoshop maker Adobe Systems Inc reported a 21 percent jump in quarterly revenue, as more customers subscribed to its creative and marketing software products provided over the Internet.
The company's net income rose to $174.5 million, or 35 cents per share, in the third quarter ended Aug. 28, from $44.7 million, or 9 cents per share, a year earlier.
Revenue rose to $1.22 billion from $1.01 billion. (Reporting by Abhirup Roy in Bengaluru; Editing by Sriraj Kalluvila)
